page.title: 14ACTIVITIES FOR ADULTS
page.content: THORPE HAS A LARGE NUMBER OF CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES SO EVERYONE SHOULD BE ABLE TO FIND SOMETHING TO THEIR TASTE. AT THE THORPE-LE-SOKEN CENTRE AT TENDRING HIGH SCHOOL THERE ARE DAYTIME AND EVENING CLASSES ON A WIDE RANGE OF SUBJECTS BOTH RECREATIONAL AND EDUCATIONAL. FOR LADIES THERE IS A WOMEN'S INSTITUTE, WIVES GROUP AND BRITISH LEGION WOMEN'S SECTION AS WELL AS CHURCH-BASED GROUPS. FOR THE ELDERLY, THE DARBY AND JOAN CLUB IS POPULAR AND COACH TRANSPORT IS PROVIDED TO THE WEEKLY MEETINGS. THE SCOUT GROUP CURRENTLY ORGANISES WHIST DRIVES ON WEDNESDAY AFTERNOONS AND THESE ARE WELL SUPPORTED. FOR THOSE NEEDING A LITTLE GENTLE EXERCISE IN SUMMER THERE IS A BOWLS CLUB, BEHIND THE "MAIDS HEAD" HOTEL. THE DOG TRAINING CLUB MEETS AT THE W.I.HALL ON TUESDAY EVENINGS.
